Text: Re Curtailment at Clear Sky Cc LNotesnsf Mark Here are all the relevant Documents for Indian Mesa Please refer to Exhibit B interim and Exhibit D Kurt Anderson PM To Olivia nron cc Subject Re Curtailment at Clear Sky FYI Forwarded by Kurt AndersonEWCEnron on PM Mark Fisher AM To Kurt NRON cc Hollis NRON Subject Re Curtailment at Clear Sky I requested the actual power curves from Olivia I need a wind speed to kw list I didnt need the warranty amount Kurt Anderson AM To Mark nron cc Hollis NRON Subject Re Curtailment at Clear Sky Mark the curtailment periods have been resent this is the first I have heard about your requirement regarding the contractual power curve it is Mark Fisher AM To Kurt NRON cc Hollis NRON Subject Re Curtailment at Clear Sky Kurt I am unfamiliar with the below request To complete the curtailment for Clear Sky that I was looking at I will need the contractual power curve and a new copy of the curtailment periods Due to my email problems rom earlier this week I lost many email messages that one appears to have been one of them Mark Fisher Forwarded by Mark FisherEWCEnron on AM Hollis Kimbrough AM To Kurt NRON cc Matthew nron Jeff NRON Mark nron Subject Re Curtailment at Clear Sky Kurt Attached is a work request corresponding to the attached email As you can see we need some additional information before we can start the work With the deadline of tomorrow please do not delay in providing the extra information Also note that we may not have the curtailment information We need to know the timeframe for the request before we can say either we have it or we dont have it Thanks Hollis Kurt Anderson PM To Hollis NRON cc Matthew nron Jeff NRON Subject Re Curtailment at Clear Sky Yes the services of your department are requested We need the data as soon as possible I would think the customer expects to see this by Friday at the latest This is related to a request that Mark Fisher has been working on perhaps he can provide additional background on this issue KA Hollis Kimbrough PM To Kurt NRON cc Matthew nron Jeff NRON Subject Curtailment at Clear Sky Kurt We havent heard anything regarding a request for data for AEP Do we need to be involved and if so then what is the timeframe that you need the data for Hollis Forwarded by Hollis KimbroughEWCEnron on PM Klaus Obel PM To Kurt NRON Bo nron cc Hollis NRON Subject Curtailment at Clear Sky Kurt how far have we gotten with this process Do we have the information requested below available Thanks Klaus Forwarded by Klaus ObelEWCEnron on PM on AM To cc Subject Curtailment at Clear Sky Rich Simon needs the following data or minute average wind speed wind direction from Met Tower and if it is still standing from the meter tower or minute energy production for each turbine Which turbines were curtailed and when and how long they were curtailed Let me know if and how long it will take to gather this data Ward Marshall Director Business Development AEP Energy Services Inc Riverside Plaza Columbus OH Office Fax Cell
